name: RMX Real Motocross
description:
Prepare for an amazing gaming experience in realistic Motocross game! Race with AI in Singleplayer mode or online with your friends using Multiplayer mode! Fix your motorcycle and upgrade parts to win on increasingly difficult tracks!

Take part in exciting motocross racing!
* Race on differentiated tracks
* Upgrade your bike to score higher place
* Fix broken parts
* Earn cash and trophies
* Unlock and learn new tricks to earn additional cash
* Learn new skills on the training track
* Race with other players online using multiplayer mode
* Compete in global rankings
* Personalize your Biker and Motorcycle

Game features:
* 10 unique tracks with differentiated difficulty level
* Many interchangeable motorcycle parts
* Singleplayer and Multiplayer mode
* 6 motocross tricks to learn
* 18 colors for your costume and bike
* 9 designs of the suit and the helmet
* 15 designs of stickers for your bike
* 10 cups to win!

RMX is so addictive you won't be able to stop playing!

Supported languages: Polish, English, French, German, Spanish i Chinese
